doc:
Mathilde Comont https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mathilde_Comont 0 Mathilde Comont (9 September 1886 – 21 June 1938) was a French-born American actress of the silent era. She appeared in films in her native country, particularly shorts, before going on to appear in US films, she would feature in a total of 71 films between 1908 and 1937. A largish and short women of 5 feet,4 inches, she died in Hollywood, California from a heart attack. Mathilde_Comont ( 9_September_1886 – 21_June_1938 ) was a_French-born_American_actress of the_silent_era .
